attributes.action: Reduce the number of airplane inbound and outbound of the UK to help and reduce CO2 emission which is the biggest contributor to global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Planes are the biggest contributors to the gloabl warming today and no one is doing anything to stop the mount of planes taking off and polluting our environment. Low-cost airlines are growing like mushrooms and one national airline company even have for example, 11 flight TO NEW YORK - Why????? 500 flights to Spain a day - just imagine how much pollution that is and how these airplanes help to speed up the global warming process.

Please, please, please support this petition - we cant reverse the effect of global warming but we could certainly stop it from increasing. Imagine the UK being underwater when the sea-level rises?????

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
